long_description: With enough style to for a night out in town and enough warmth for a long day of Nordic skiing, the versatile merino wool Neve Ryan Full-Zip sweater will get a lot of use this winter season. Soft ultrafine merino wool insulates well on chilly winter days. Hand pockets. Hand wash, lay flat to dry. Neve Ryan Full-Neck sweater has a classic fit.
short_description: With enough style to for a night out in town and enough warmth for a long day of Nordic skiing, the versatile merino wool Neve Ryan Full-Zip sweater will get a lot of use this winter season.
